you do realize this is a 4 GB file not MB right.  And just because your internet speed is 7 mb does not mean you will download at that speed.  Do a little research and tweak your settings on what ever program you are using to download. I have a 12MB connection and usually finish a movie in 3-4 hours.

Hey mckinnon these movies are not only 4gb, but it takes Brick and the rest of the crew a lot of work to put these movies up.  I am talking 12 to 16 hours to convert these movies using RipBot.  So dont complain, its really annoying.  Also, the download speed changes based on how many seeders there are.  

Brick, I finally got RipBot to work with Windows 7.  I did have to use an older version!
